hero.description1: Real estate, art, wine, private equity, infrastructure.
hero.description2: WealthPark creates a global platform to democratize access to alternative asset investments that were previously available only to a select few. We aim to build a society where everyone has equal opportunities to invest in alternative assets through technology.

vision.heading: Vision
vision.title: Be Alternative
vision.subtitle: ー Creating a world where freedom of choice is the norm ー

mission.heading: Mission
mission.title:
Deliver investment opportunities in
alternative assets to everyone
mission.description:
Alternative assets refer to new investment targets and investment methods other than traditional assets such as listed stocks and bonds. Specifically, they include real estate, art, whiskey, wine, and unlisted stocks.
These alternative assets have long-standing market challenges, such as the lack of a common data infrastructure compared to traditional assets, the need for physical interim management, and many analog elements that make them accessible only to a limited number of people.
WealthPark creates a platform for alternative assets through technology, realizing a society where everyone has equal investment opportunities and challenging the democratization of alternative investments.

profile.heading: Company Profile
profile.employeesValue: 150 employees (as of September 30, 2025, including group companies)
profile.branchesValue: Tohoku Office / Kansai Office / Kyushu Office

intro.title: A Life with More Freedom of Choice.
intro.description:
Whether or not you can properly handle 'investment' in your long life greatly impacts your life's richness and happiness.

WealthPark is taking on the challenge of creating a better world by delivering investment opportunities and possibilities to everyone. We continue to make various challenges and growth, steadily moving forward, but we are still halfway there.

Why not enrich your own life possibilities and choices by joining us in tackling the grand vision of 'creating a world where freedom of choice is the norm.'

Through technology, we aim to realize a society where everyone has equal investment opportunities and challenge the democratization of alternative investments.

mission.title: Mission
mission.heading: Deliver investment opportunities in alternative assets to everyone
mission.description:
Alternative assets refer to new investment targets and methods other than traditional assets such as listed stocks and bonds. Specifically, they include real estate, art, whiskey, wine, and unlisted stocks.
These alternative assets have long-standing market challenges compared to traditional assets, such as the lack of a common data infrastructure, the need for physical interim management, and many analog elements that make them accessible only to a limited number of people.
WealthPark creates a platform for alternative assets through technology, realizing a society where everyone has equal investment opportunities and challenging the democratization of alternative investments.

customerCentric.title: CUSTOMER CENTRIC
customerCentric.description:
We act and think based on our customers' expectation and needs.
Our business dedicates to providing and adding values for our customers.

goBeyond.title: GO BEYOND
goBeyond.description:
We go beyond our roles and positions to take actions that we know will help the business as a whole.
We are always proactively interacting and helping each other.

appreciationRespect.title: APPRECIATION AND RESPECT
appreciationRespect.description: We respect diversity and communicate appreciation to the team, and show it with words and acting.

commitResults.title: COMMIT TO RESULTS
commitResults.description:
When we commit to something, we will go the distance.
No matter what the difficulty is we think about why we can do it, not why we cannot, and stick to delivering the results.

doRightThing.title: DO THE RIGHT THING
doRightThing.description:
We always act with integrity and honesty to the society.
We take pride in doing the right things.

about.title: Realizing DX in Real Estate Management with WealthPark Business
about.description: WealthPark Business is a business support system that connects property owners and management companies via app. By providing a cloud-based system for property management companies and an owner app (smartphone app and website) for owners, income/expense reporting and sales proposals become simple and speedy.

points.point1Title: Reduce Analog Operations. Improve Efficiency and Cut Costs
points.point1Description: Income/expense reporting via app and web eliminates printing, stuffing, and mailing. With all owner reporting and approvals handled through the system, efficiency and visibility are achieved, dramatically improving management productivity.
points.point2Title: Increase Owner Satisfaction. Expand Management Units
points.point2Description: Owners can check asset information anytime, anywhere, and easily download data for tax filing. Management company inquiries can be approved with one click. Improved convenience and satisfaction for owners leads to further management acquisition and prevents management loss.
points.point3Title: New Proposal Opportunities to Owners via Smartphone
points.point3Description: The owner app becomes a touchpoint with owners, making it easy to promote seminars, introduce recommended properties, and propose ancillary products. Furthermore, accumulated data becomes valuable assets that can be leveraged for business strategy and sales strategy.

cashflow.title: Digitalization of Income/Expense Statements and Reports
cashflow.description: Share simple and easy-to-read income/expense reports via app and web

chat.title: Chat Communication
chat.description: Smoother information sharing within the company using chat

workflow.title: Activity Function
workflow.description: Simple and reliable reporting/approval to owners
